name: J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc.
description: J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. is a leading provider of transportation and logistics services in North America. Founded in 1961 by Johnnie Bryan Hunt and his wife, J.B. Hunt has grown to become one of the largest publicly traded transportation companies in the United States. The company operates a diverse fleet of trucks and trailers, providing an array of services that include intermodal, dedicated, and truckload transportation. J.B. Hunt's intermodal services leverage a combination of rail and truck transport, resulting in efficient and cost-effective solutions for customers. The company is also recognized for its dedicated contract services, where it partners with customers to provide tailored transportation solutions that meet their specific needs. With a strong emphasis on technology, J.B. Hunt utilizes advanced logistics software and data analytics to optimize operations and improve customer service. The company is committed to sustainability and is continually enhancing its fleet with fuel-efficient vehicles and eco-friendly practices. J.B. Hunt's mission is to create the best transportation experience for its customers while ensuring the safety and well-being of its employees and the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc. | Leading Transportation and Logistics Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc., a top provider of transportation and logistics services in North America. Discover their commitment to customer service and sustainability.

faq.question: What services does J.B. Hunt provide?
faq.answer: J.B. Hunt provides intermodal, dedicated contract, and truckload transportation services, as well as logistics solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of J.B. Hunt?
faq.answer: John Roberts is the CEO of J.B. Hunt Transport Services, Inc.

faq.question: Where is J.B. Hunt headquartered?
faq.answer: J.B. Hunt is headquartered in Lowell, Arkansas, USA.
